head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HINDIN, PHYLLIS L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HINDIN, PHYLLIS L.

block.p: HINDIN-Phyllis L. Beloved wife of the late Albert. Devoted mother of Bettina and mother-in-law of Lawrence Hertz. Cherished grandmother of Jordan. Loving sister of Dennis Kornfield and the late Barbara Moscowitz. Sister-in-law of Susan and George. Services Sunday 1PM, at Riverside Nassau North Chapels, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, New York.
